18293.quoteText: We do not currently honor Do Not Track signals from internet browsers.
18293.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

21108.quoteText: You can disable browser cookies before visiting our websites. However, if you do so, you may not be able to use certain features of the websites properly.
21108.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
